metadata.name: Suspicious Unblock-File
metadata.comment: Remove the Zone.Identifier alternate data stream which identifies the file as downloaded from the internet.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('unblock-file ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-path ')))

output.summary: Remove the Zone.Identifier alternate data stream which identifies the file as downloaded from the internet.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell scripts References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1553.005/T1553.005.md#atomic-test-3---remove-the-zoneidentifier-alternate-data-stream, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/unblock-file?view=powershell-7.2
